item.title: Setting up a Hugo page made me work with git submodules
item.description: This blog is using Hugo with the minimal theme. I followed the README on how to integrate a theme into a Hugo site. It mentioned git submodules, so I added a submodule. Working with submodules is inconvenient and I decided not to use them. For instance, every time I change something in the submodule, I have to commit the latest commit reference to the main repo. I used git version 2.
